title: How to get PBE Account?

replies.body: The PBE is intended to help test new content and have it ready for live play,  It's existence isn't really to preview content, but to help get it ready.  If you're interested in helping, you can apply [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Good luck!
Can i have a Pbe account please ?{{summoner:4}}
how can i get pbe account on eune?
Hogyan tudok pbe szerverre accountot készíteni?

Go to leauges website and login. Hover over your screen name and click PBE then click "I want to help!" After that it's just a waiting game. Fair warning you may or may not get accepted right away. Getting into the PBE can take a matter of days to a year or more. I've applied since last year and I haven't gotten anything in my emails saying that I've been accepted.
how to get accaunt for pbe north america
